subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Jose Reyes declared that he had no intention of leaving his longtime agent for Scott Boras, but that’s no reason for the Mets to rest too easy as their star shortstop’s free agency approaches.
snippet: Jose Reyes declared that he had no intention of leaving his longtime agent for Scott Boras, but that’s no reason for the Mets to rest too easy as their star shortstop’s free agency approaches.
